ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) reported in a Cycle 1 Account Statement or in Passbook on a particular date.

desc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) reported
in a Cycle 1 Account Statement or in Passbook on a particular date.
Key of this table would have two components separated by a "-", the first component being a valid Account record key and the second component being a Date in the format YYYYMMDD.
ID of the STMT.ENTRY record reported in the Cycle 1 Account Statement or in Passbook.
